# pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.sha2

```python
pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.sha2(
	col: pyspark_dubber.sql.expr.Expr | str,
	numBits: int,
)
```

[PySpark API Reference](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.functions.sha2.html)

!!! warning "Incompatibility Note"

    Only `numBits` 256 or 512 are supported.
